items.title: Ironhack
items.subtitle: Student
items.text: Learned modern full-stack development using JavaScript, React, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. Built and deployed full-stack apps using Agile practices.

items.title: Upwork
items.subtitle: Senior Freelance Software Engineer
items.text: Successfully delivered high-impact web and mobile applications for global clients, specializing in React, Next.js, React Native, Node.js, NestJS, AWS, Python, and AI/ML solutions.

items.title: IntelliCode
items.subtitle: Senior Full Stack Developer
items.text: Led full-stack development at IntelliCode, building scalable web applications and APIs using React, Next.js, Python, Django, FastAPI, and AWS to deliver robust software solutions for diverse client needs.

items.title: iTexico
items.subtitle: Full Stack Developer
items.text: Developed and scaled a modern single-page application while leading key migrations from Backbone to React, building a custom UI framework, and implementing high-performance features using technologies like ElasticSearch, Kafka, AWS, and TypeScript.

items.title: EPAM Systems
items.subtitle: Senior Developer
items.text: Led the design and implementation of a scalable AWS architecture and internal admin platform, integrating serverless technologies and security automation while developing custom tools, dashboards, and cost-optimized cloud solutions using React, Node.js, and AWS services.

items.title: Dextra Technologies
items.subtitle: Web Developer
items.text: Improved system reliability by implementing retry logic and resolving bugs, enhanced API capabilities, and seamlessly migrated service integrations while preserving core functionality using Node.js, AWS, and SQL databases.

items.title: UST Global
items.subtitle: Software Engineer
items.text: Developed RESTful web services with Jersey, Hibernate, and Spring, practiced test-driven development, created and executed test cases, managed the full defect lifecycle, and contributed to frontend updates using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.
